A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: We saw The Last Jedi - Christmas Day. Unfortunately after sitting through 2.5 hours of great visuals yet frustraingly bad writing & directing we walked out and all immediately agreed this movie was not just a bad Star Wars movie. It is a terrible movie period. 6 story lines to follow including many new characters who are so poorly developed you wonder if they are just introduced so that Disney cannot get held up by the \"stars\" of the movie.
